title: Dough in a dream is good news for Ibn Sirin

preview.html: There are many interpretations of seeing dough in a dream. It is known in real life that dough and pastries are among the things that bring pleasure and joy to the people of the house in which the dough is baked, and seeing them in a dream indicates an increase in the dreamer’s livelihood and brings him a feeling of peace and joy. Dough in a dream Dough in a dream is good news from the favorite dreams. For the dreamer to see the dough of a bright white color, which indicates the good that is coming to him. The dream of seeing wheat flour dough in a dream is a dream that promises its owner joy and happiness. Seeing the dough in a dream promises good news, joy, and the removal of the fortuneteller’s fears. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, Search from Google on the Egyptian dream interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Dough in a dream is good news for Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that the dreamer prepares the dough himself and spreads it as one of the praiseworthy visions as it shows an increase in money and a blessing in his life, work and livelihood, and among his interpretations That dough in a dream appears. His diligence in his work. Seeing someone dividing dough in a dream means that he is balanced and clear in the affairs of his life and is only on the right path. Seeing dough symbolizes that the fortuneteller’s livelihood is lawful and that God is not angry. If the dough in the dream is made of barley flour, then this vision shows his piety And his piety and his love for doing good and following the Sunnah and the righteous. Dough in a dream is good news for single women. Seeing leavened dough for an unmarried woman means that she is a good girl whose life is going in a direction that pleases God and His Messenger. If she works at a job and in her dreams she kneads dough, this means that she will achieve the goal that she had She aspires to it in her work. Watching dough in a dream for an unmarried woman and it being soft means that she will enjoy a happy and full life. Dough in a dream is good news for a married woman. If a married woman presents baked dough to her family in a dream, it means that she will successfully shoulder family responsibilities and know how to manage her family’s affairs. If she sees herself cutting the dough, this indicates that she is always thinking about her family and putting in a lot of effort to make her home successful. If he sees that he is kneading the dough and putting sugar, this indicates that he is waiting for happy news that will happen soon. If the lady sees that she is keeping the dough in the refrigerator after making it This is an indication that she is safe from poverty and lack of livelihood. Dough in a dream is good news for a pregnant woman. To dream of a pregnant woman kneading dough is a clear sign that she will hear good news and that good events will happen and that she is a good woman and will raise her children well. If she sees herself kneading dough Of barley flour, this is clear evidence that she and her fetus are in good health and that her birth will be easy. The dreamer’s vision when he sees fully fermented dough is one of the indicators of an imminent birth. From the interpretation of fermenting dough in a pregnant woman’s dream, an easy and lawful livelihood approaches with the arrival of the new baby and the birth will be easy. The most important interpretations of dough in a dream: Eating dough in a dream: If one sees in his dream that he is eating dough

title: What is the interpretation of a braid of hair in a dream? What is the meaning of a braid of hair in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Today we learn about the interpretation of hair braiding in a dream in different circumstances. This dream is one of the recurring dreams that many girls see in a dream, and they cannot determine the meanings that the dream carries or the connotations it refers to. Through the following article on the encyclopedia website, we will examine with you what the interpretations of the dream have been said by scholars, so follow us. Interpretation of braiding hair in a dream. Interpretations of the braid differ. In the dream of an unmarried girl, depending on the details contained in the dream, as follows: Braiding hair in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that she is braiding her hair or the hair of another person, this dream symbolizes the strength of will and toughness that this girl has when facing problems. She faces, and he also promises her that she will overcome the problems. That falls on her, and she can achieve the goals that she seeks in life. It is an auspicious dream for an unmarried girl to dream that she has a thick braid, as this dream indicates that she will rise in her job and become a famous figure in society and have a strong influence and influence on others. Some say The interpreters say that for an unmarried girl who sees a braid in her dream, this dream indicates that this girl will meet the boy of her dreams, marriage will take place between them, and she will live a happy life with him, God willing. Among the interpretations given to interpret seeing a braid in a dream is that the girl who sees this dream shows that she will learn many useful skills that will reflect positively on her personal and professional life and change and develop her personality. For the better. Seeing a network in a man’s dream. There are many interpretations that have been given regarding a man seeing a braid in a dream, and among these interpretations are: If a man sees a braid in a dream, then this dream indicates that he will find a good job, which will make him more stable in his life. Some interpreters say that a man who sees in his dream that his hair is braided, then this dream indicates that he will be able to reach the goals he seeks, whether related to his academic or professional life. It is a good dream for a married man to see that he is braiding his daughter’s hair. This dream indicates that he is making a great effort to raise his daughter well and that the girl actually has good morals that make her respected by everyone. Around.Among the unpleasant interpretations of dreams, the dreamer sees in a dream that he has no hair on his head, and this dream indicates that the dreamer will fall into many problems, but there is no need to worry, God Almighty will help him overcome them.A network in a young man’s dreamAmong the strange dreams that A young man sees in a dream that his hair is braided, but these dreams have different interpretations as follows: A young man who sees that he is arguing with the hair of one of his family members, then this dream is a message to the fortuneteller that the person he saw in the dream is suffering from a big problem in his life and that he needs help from the fortuneteller. He cannot ask for it, so the fortuneteller must check the circumstances of that person and help him get out of the crisis he is suffering from.

title: Seeing the mother in a dream by Nabulsi

preview.html: God Almighty said: “O chiefs, give me a fatwa for my dreams if you interpret a vision.” Learn about the interpretation of seeing the mother in a dream from Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, whose interpretation is known only to God Almighty from this gift, which is the interpretation of dreams. As in some cases, the dreams that a person sees are messages from God Almighty to him, and at other times they are meaningless dreams, and in this article in the Encyclopedia we present the interpretation of seeing the mother in a dream. Seeing the mother in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing the mother in a dream Al-Nabulsi is considered one of the most important imams of dream interpretation in the world. Seeing the mother in a dream sees the following: Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing the mother in a dream is more deserving of interpreting visions than the father. If he sees in a dream that his mother gives birth to him again and the dreamer is sick. This indicates the imminent death of the dreamer, and that he will be wrapped in a piece of death cloth like a wrapped little child. If a person sees his mother in a dream. This indicates what he actually feels and the psychological state he is going through. If a person sees his mother dead in a dream. This indicates the approach of many problems and concerns for the fortune teller. But if a person sees his dead mother in a dream. This indicates that goodness and happiness are approaching the seer, and shows his high status in the afterlife, and that he enjoys bliss and happiness there. Seeing a married woman in her dream means that her deceased mother is sitting at home. For the happiness and joy that she will soon get. A dream of a married woman with her crying mother. It shows that there are many problems and concerns in the woman's life. A married woman who sees her mother crying in a dream may indicate the dreamer's death. Interpretation of seeing the mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is considered the most important imam of dream interpretation in the world and interpreted seeing the mother in a dream as follows: Seeing the mother in a dream is good news for the fortune teller in general. If a person sees his mother in a dream. This indicates the arrival of a lot of goodness and joy in all the circumstances of the seer. If a person sees his mother in a dream talking to him. This indicates the arrival of a lot of goodness and food to the seer. Seeing a dead mother in a dream. It shows that many happy events are about to happen. If a person sees his mother standing in the house in a dream. This indicates the presence of goodness and blessings in all the details of the dreamer's life. If the patient sees his mother in a dream. This indicates his imminent death. If someone sees his mother crying in a dream. This indicates that he is sick. If a person sees his mother's death in a dream. This indicates that many problems await him. If a person sees his mother calling him in a dream. This indicates the short life of this person in his life and his failure to adhere to the right choices. Ibn Shaheen's interpretation of seeing a dead mother in a dream Ibn Shaheen is one of the great imams of dream interpretation. He interpreted the death of the mother in a dream as follows: If a person dreams of the death of his living mother. This indicates the approach of many of the dreamer's worries and problems. Whoever sees in a dream the death of his living mother by screaming and wailing over her. This indicates the death of his mother or her appearance

title: Interpretation of a nun in a dream - Seeing a monk in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a nun, monk, or priest in a church for single, married, pregnant, and divorced women according to Ibn Sirin and others. Nuns. Interpretation of a nun in a dream. Seeing a nun in a dream. If a religious person dreams of a nun, then he will give up the hermit’s life for some material pleasures and entertainment, but for a temporary period. He must insist on the wisdom of his conduct. If a woman dreams of seeing a nun, then in the future she will become a widow or leave her husband or lover. If she dreams that she is a nun, this means her dissatisfaction and alienation from the current circumstances that surround her. Seeing a dead nun in a dream means feeling sadness and grief due to betrayal of loved ones and loss of property and money. If a nun dreams that she is taking off her monastic robe, that is, leaving the monastic corps, this means that she longs for worldly pleasures that hinder her fulfillment of her mission. Interpretation of a nun in a dream: For a woman to dream of a nun is evidence of her widowhood or perhaps separation from a lover. As for a man, if he dreams of a nun, this is a sign of things Materialism turns against spirituality. Interpretation of a monk in a dream: Seeing a monk in a dream means disagreements in the family and failed trips. If a girl sees a monk in a dream, it means that she will be exposed to rumors and gossip. To dream that you are a monk portends illness and personal loss. If you dream of a hermit or a monk, this means great misfortune that will befall you because of an unfaithful friend. As for dreaming that you live the life of a hermit, this means that you are conservative and selfish and it is difficult to approach her. The monk symbolizes a solitary life and permanent loneliness, but it is a good omen. Interpretation of the head of the monastery in the dream. A monastery for nuns. If a girl dreams of seeing a nunnery, this means that she will be forced to perform unpleasant tasks and will give up. To authority, but after failed disobedience. If you dream of a smiling and kind abbot, it means that you will be surrounded by loyal friends and pleasant signs of success.

title: Interpretation of seeing yourself running in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing running in a dream via the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing yourself running in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of running in a dream depending on the condition and circumstances of the viewer and whether the man or woman is single, married, or pregnant. Based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin who sees running in a dream? Seeing running in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a diligent person who always seeks to achieve his goals and aspirations in life. Seeing running in a dream also indicates The fortuneteller’s health and his healthy, disease-free body. Seeing in a dream that you are running in the same place indicates the dreamer’s inability to overcome problems and obstacles in his life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a running race in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing running in Nabulsi’s dream? Seeing running to lose weight in a dream indicates The viewer is dissatisfied with his life. Seeing yourself running fast in a dream indicates the struggle and effort that the dreamer is making to achieve something he wants very much. What is the interpretation of seeing running in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a single woman running after monsters in a dream shows that she is a strong girl who can face all the challenges in Her life. title: Interpretation of seeing a friend betraying you in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a friend’s betrayal in a dream: Seeing a friend’s betrayal in a dream is one of the expressive signs of a crisis in the dreamer’s life. He may have been betrayed and betrayed by a person, and dreaming about him is a warning message to the dreamer. Interpreters indicate that seeing a friend’s betrayal in a dream indicates that the dreamer He lives in a state of anguish, distress, and poverty. If the dreamer sees that one of his friends is cheating on him, this means that the dreamer is going through a bad psychological state and pressures resulting from his professional life, but relief is inevitably approaching, God willing. Some scholars believe that deception and betrayal in a dream are symbols that indicate coexistence. The dreamer is in a state of poverty and distress, and despite that, the dream has indications of abundant livelihood and comfort. Interpretation of seeing a friend’s betrayal in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a friend’s betrayal in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she is surrounded by an evil girl who causes her troubles and troubles, so she must stay away from her. In If an unmarried woman sees her friends betraying and abandoning her in a dream, this indicates the extent of her attachment to them and her will. If she sees her lover’s betrayal in a dream for an unmarried woman, this means that she will get married soon and this dream shows her anxiety about future life. Seeing a lover’s betrayal and seeing him with a girl in a dream means The girl does not feel confident and the relationship between the two parties is exposed to many problems. Interpretation of seeing a friend cheating in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees her boyfriend cheating on her in a dream means that she does not feel safe with that girl and needs to be careful about her. Dreaming about a friend cheating and carrying a sharp tool It means that the pregnant woman will give birth by caesarean section and give birth to her child safely and healthily. If a pregnant woman sees that her boyfriend is cheating on her in a dream, this means that she feels fear and anxiety about childbirth and this has affected her dreams. Seeing a friend’s betrayal in a pregnant woman’s dream means that she is suffering from marital problems that have affected On her psychological health, however, the situation between them will calm down in the coming period. If a pregnant woman sees someone around her cheating on her in a dream, this means that there is a problem between them and a lack of trust in that person, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. The interpretation of seeing a friend cheating in a dream for a man is indicated by senior interpretation scholars. title: Dough in a dream is good news for Ibn Sirin

preview.html: There are many interpretations of seeing dough in a dream. It is known in real life that dough and pastries are among the things that bring pleasure and joy to the people of the house in which the dough is baked, and seeing them in a dream indicates an increase in the dreamer’s livelihood and brings him a feeling of peace and joy. Dough in a dream Dough in a dream is good news from the favorite dreams. For the dreamer to see the dough of a bright white color, which indicates the good that is coming to him. The dream of seeing wheat flour dough in a dream is a dream that promises its owner joy and happiness. Seeing the dough in a dream promises good news, joy, and the removal of the fortuneteller’s fears. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, Search from Google on the Egyptian dream interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Dough in a dream is good news for Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that the dreamer prepares the dough himself and spreads it as one of the praiseworthy visions as it shows an increase in money and a blessing in his life, work and livelihood, and among his interpretations That dough in a dream appears. His diligence in his work. Seeing someone dividing dough in a dream means that he is balanced and clear in the affairs of his life and is only on the right path. Seeing dough symbolizes that the fortuneteller’s livelihood is lawful and that God is not angry. If the dough in the dream is made of barley flour, then this vision shows his piety And his piety and his love for doing good and following the Sunnah and the righteous. Dough in a dream is good news for single women. Seeing leavened dough for an unmarried woman means that she is a good girl whose life is going in a direction that pleases God and His Messenger. If she works at a job and in her dreams she kneads dough, this means that she will achieve the goal that she had She aspires to it in her work. Watching dough in a dream for an unmarried woman and it being soft means that she will enjoy a happy and full life. Dough in a dream is good news for a married woman. If a married woman presents baked dough to her family in a dream, it means that she will successfully shoulder family responsibilities and know how to manage her family’s affairs. If she sees herself cutting the dough, this indicates that she is always thinking about her family and putting in a lot of effort to make her home a success. If he sees that he is kneading the dough and putting sugar, this indicates that he is waiting for happy news that will happen soon. If the lady sees that she is keeping the dough in the refrigerator after making it This is an indication that she is safe from poverty and lack of livelihood. Dough in a dream is good news for a pregnant woman. To dream of a pregnant woman kneading dough is a clear sign that she will hear good news and that good events will happen and that she is a good woman and will raise her children well. If she sees herself kneading dough Of barley flour, this is clear evidence that she and her fetus are in good health and that her birth will be easy. The dreamer’s vision when he sees fully fermented dough is one of the indicators of an imminent birth. From the interpretation of fermenting dough in a pregnant woman’s dream, an easy and lawful livelihood approaches with the arrival of the new baby and the birth will be easy. The most important interpretations of dough in a dream: Eating dough in a dream: If one sees in his dream that he is eating dough

Which she faces, he also promises her that she will overcome the problems. That falls on her, and she can achieve the goals that she seeks in life. title: Seeing the mother in Nabulsi’s dream

preview.html: God Almighty said: “O chiefs, give me a fatwa for my dreams if you interpret a vision.” Learn about the interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream from Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin, and Ibn Shaheen, whose interpretation God Almighty knows only from this gift, which is the interpretation of dreams. Also, in some cases, the dreams that a person sees are messages from God Almighty to him, and at other times they are meaningless dreams, and in this article in the encyclopedia we present the interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream. Seeing a mother in a dream about Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream. Al-Nabulsi is considered one of the most important imams. Interpretation of dreams in the world. Seeing a mother in a dream indicates the following: Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing a mother in a dream is more worthy of interpreting dreams than a father. If he sees in a dream that his mother is giving birth to him again and the dreamer is sick. This indicates that the dreamer will die soon, and that he will be wrapped in the cloth of death like a small child wrapped. If one sees his mother in a dream. This indicates what he actually feels and the psychological state he is going through. If one sees his mother dead in a dream. This indicates the approach of many problems and concerns for divination.But if one sees in a dream his dead mother in a dream. This indicates that goodness and happiness are approaching the dreamer, and shows his high status in the afterlife, and that he enjoys bliss and happiness there. Seeing a married woman in her dream means that her deceased mother is sitting at home. For the happiness and joy that you will have soon. A dream for a married woman with her crying mother. It appears that there are many problems and fears in a woman’s life. A married woman who sees her mother crying in a dream may indicate the death of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is considered the most important imam of dream interpretation in the world and he interpreted seeing a mother in a dream as follows: A mother in a dream is good news for the fortuneteller in general. If one sees his mother in a dream. This indicates the arrival of a lot of goodness and joy in all circumstances of the dreamer. If one sees his mother in a dream talking to him. This indicates that a lot of goodness and food will reach the dreamer. Seeing a dead mother in a dream. It shows that many happy events are about to happen. If a person sees his mother standing at home in a dream. This indicates the presence of goodness and blessing in every detail of the dreamer’s life. If the sick person sees his mother in a dream. This indicates his imminent death. If someone sees his mother crying in a dream. This indicates that he is afflicted with the disease. If a person sees the death of his mother in a dream. This indicates that many problems await him. If one sees his mother calling him in a dream. This indicates the short duration of this person’s life in his life and his lack of commitment to making the right choices. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing a dead mother in a dreamIbn Shaheen is one of the major imams of dream interpretation. The death of a mother in a dream is interpreted as follows: If one dreams of the death of his living mother. This indicates the approach of many of the dreamer’s worries and problems. Whoever sees in a dream the death of his living mother by screaming and wailing over her. This indicates the death of his or her mother

title: Interpretation of a nun in a dream - Seeing a monk in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a nun, monk, or priest in a church for single, married, pregnant, and divorced women according to Ibn Sirin and others. Nuns. Interpretation of a nun in a dream. Seeing a nun in a dream. If a religious person dreams of a nun, then he will give up the hermit’s life for some material pleasures and entertainment, but for a temporary period. He must insist on the wisdom of his conduct. If a woman dreams of seeing a nun, then in the future she will become a widow or leave her husband or lover. If she dreams that she is a nun, this means her dissatisfaction and alienation from the current circumstances that surround her. Seeing a dead nun in a dream means feeling sadness and grief due to betrayal of loved ones and loss of property and money. If a nun dreams that she is taking off her monastic robe, that is, leaving the monastic corps, this means that she longs for worldly pleasures that hinder her fulfillment of her mission. Interpretation of a nun in a dream: For a woman to dream of a nun is evidence of her widowhood or perhaps separation from a lover. As for a man, if he dreams of a nun, this is a sign of things Materialism turns against spirituality. Interpretation of a monk in a dream: Seeing a monk in a dream means disagreements in the family and failed trips. If a girl sees a monk in a dream, it means that she will be exposed to rumors and gossip. To dream that you are a monk portends illness and personal loss. If you dream of a hermit or a monk, this means great misfortune that will befall you because of an unfaithful friend. As for dreaming that you live the life of a hermit, this means that you are conservative and selfish and it is difficult to approach her. The monk symbolizes a solitary life and permanent loneliness, but it is a good omen. Interpretation of the head of the monastery in the dream. A monastery for nuns. If a girl dreams of seeing a nunnery, this means that she will be forced to perform unpleasant tasks and will give up. To authority, but after failed disobedience. If you dream of a smiling and kind abbot, it means that you will be surrounded by loyal friends and pleasant signs of success.

title: Interpretation of seeing yourself running in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing running in a dream via the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing yourself running in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of running in a dream depending on the condition and circumstances of the viewer and whether the man or woman is single, married, or pregnant. Based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin who sees running in a dream? Seeing running in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a hardworking person who always seeks to achieve his goals and aspirations in life. Seeing running in a dream also indicates The fortuneteller’s health and his healthy, disease-free body. Seeing in a dream that you are running in the same place indicates the dreamer’s inability to overcome problems and obstacles in his life. Seeing yourself running fast in a dream indicates the struggle and effort that the dreamer is making to achieve something he wants very much. What is the interpretation of seeing running in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a single woman running after monsters in a dream shows that she is a strong girl who can face all the challenges in Her life. Seeing a single woman chasing a man in a dream shows that she will achieve all her desires and ambitions in life. Seeing a single woman running from a predatory animal in a dream indicates that he will meet someone and propose to her soon. title: Interpretation of seeing a friend betrayal in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a friend’s betrayal in a dream: Seeing a friend’s betrayal in a dream is one of the expressive signs of a crisis in the dreamer’s life. He may have been betrayed and betrayed by a person, and dreaming about him is a warning message to the dreamer. Interpreters indicate that seeing a friend’s betrayal in a dream indicates that the dreamer He lives in a state of anguish, distress, and poverty. If the dreamer sees that one of his friends is cheating on him, this means that the dreamer is going through a bad psychological state and pressures resulting from his professional life, but relief is inevitably approaching, God willing. Some scholars believe that deception and betrayal in a dream are symbols that indicate coexistence. The dreamer is in a state of poverty and distress, and despite that, the dream has indications of abundant livelihood and comfort. Interpretation of seeing a friend’s betrayal in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a friend’s betrayal in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she is surrounded by an evil girl who causes her troubles and troubles, so she must stay away from her. In If an unmarried woman sees her friends betraying and abandoning her in a dream, this indicates the extent of her attachment to them and her will. If she sees her lover’s betrayal in a dream for an unmarried woman, this means that she will get married soon and this dream shows her anxiety about future life. Seeing a lover’s betrayal and seeing him with a girl in a dream means The girl does not feel confident and the relationship between the two parties is exposed to many problems. Interpretation of seeing a friend cheating in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees her boyfriend cheating on her in a dream means that she does not feel safe with that girl and needs to be careful about her. Dreaming about a friend cheating and carrying a sharp tool It means that the pregnant woman will give birth by caesarean section and give birth to her child safely and healthily. If a pregnant woman sees that her boyfriend is cheating on her in a dream, this means that she feels fear and anxiety about childbirth and this has affected her dreams. Seeing a friend’s betrayal in a pregnant woman’s dream means that she is suffering from marital problems that have affected On her psychological health, however, the situation between them will calm down in the coming period. If a pregnant woman sees someone around her cheating on her in a dream, this means that there is a problem between them and a lack of trust in that person, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. The interpretation of seeing a friend cheating in a dream for a man is indicated by senior interpretation scholars. Dreams and visions indicate that seeing a friend’s betrayal in a man’s dream means that he is suffering from a major problem at work, and the situation is still calming down, God willing. If a man sees in a dream the betrayal of someone close to him, this indicates his feeling of fear and the loss of his passion for life. If a married man sees his wife She cheats on him in a dream, this means that there are problems and disagreements between them, so that he does not feel confident or secure towards his partner. Seeing a friend’s betrayal in a man’s dream means that he will be betrayed by some of his friends, and this is reflected in his dreams. Seeing my friend cheating on me in a dream means that there is a bad person In a man’s life and it can cause him a crisis at work, so you must be careful about it.
